title: Site launch!
content: This post is being written in celebration of me launching my first neocities site. Go me! I have many things to add, but I hope you have fun with what's on here for now. Stay tuned for big things coming!

title: BIG RESET
content: This is to commemerate a big redesign project I have been undertaking, completely resetting this whole site. I deleted all previous update posts as many no longer apply.

title: Removed username assignment
content: I removed the automatic username assignment I was trying to impliment with chattable because it was kinda broken and I couldn't figure out how to fix it.

title: Added a links page to home
